0.text: Innate: Periodically, when LeBlanc is damaged to  40% maximum health, she creates a  clone of herself, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 1 second.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, when LeBlanc is damaged to  40% maximum health, she creates a clone of herself, after which they both instantly become invisible for 1 second.
markedPassages: 40% maximum health
clone
invisible

1.text: The clone can basic attack but deals no damage, lasts for 8 seconds, and starts running 1900 units towards a random place in front of LeBlanc decided the moment it spawns.
1.html: The clone can basic attack but deals no damage, lasts for 8 seconds, and starts running 1900 units towards a random place in front of LeBlanc decided the moment it spawns.

2.text: See Pets for more details about LeBlanc's clone.
2.html: See Pets for more details about LeBlanc's clone.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about LeBlanc's clone.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc projects an orb at the target enemy that deals magic damage and marks them for 3.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: LeBlanc projects an orb at the target enemy that deals magic damage and marks them for 3.5 seconds.

1.text: Leblanc's next damaging ability against the marked target will consume the mark to deal them the  same damage again.
1.html: Leblanc's next damaging ability against the marked target will consume the mark to deal them the same damage again.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc  dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. Distortion can be recast after 0.2 seconds of the dash ending for the pad's duration.
0.html: Active: LeBlanc dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. Distortion can be recast after 0.2 seconds of the dash ending for the pad's duration.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: Recast: LeBlanc  blinks to Distortion's return pad, regardless of range.
1.html: Recast: LeBlanc blinks to Distortion's return pad, regardless of range.
markedPassages: blinks

2.text: Distortion will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Distortion will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Distortion will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits and forms a  tether between LeBlanc and the target for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
0.html: Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits and forms a tether between LeBlanc and the target for 1.5 seconds, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: tether
revealed

1.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt magic damage and is  rooted for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
1.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt magic damage and is rooted for 1.5 seconds, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: rooted
revealed

0.text: Active: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of her most recently used basic ability, applying the same effects and dealing modified magic damage.

1.text: Mimic: Sigil of Malice: Deals modified damage and double damage upon triggering the mark.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • dring

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  1050

Keywords

  • boomstick

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.
